subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Andrew Luck, the No. 1 pick in April’s draft, reported to training camp on time Saturday but was overshadowed by Reggie Wayne, who came in a three-Humvee caravan.
snippet: Andrew Luck, the No. 1 pick in April’s draft, reported to training camp on time Saturday but was overshadowed by Reggie Wayne, who came in a three-Humvee caravan.
